name: The Soul Code
description:
What would you do if you found out that you are mistake? Or maybe someone is just trying to convince you of this. Once you know, you have to get to the truth. Even if it means breaking the fourth wall and becoming something more.

Armed with courage and determination, you embark on a journey to uncover the secrets and discover the answer to the ultimate question: what does it mean to be alive?

Please welcome the game from three beginners who teamed up for the love of games.

Important: use headphones for better immersion in the game.

The game was made for HorrorJam#11. It is unfinished, the second part of the game will be soon!

WARNING! The following game contains strong languages. Viewer discretion is advised.
